text:
These are my configuration options:
OPTIM=-O2 ./configure     \
            --enable-mods-shared=all  \
            --enable-ssl              \
            --disable-auth-digest
make fails with:
/home/updates/httpd-2.0.35/modules/ssl/ssl_expr_scan.l: In function 
`ssl_expr_yylex':
/home/updates/httpd-2.0.35/modules/ssl/ssl_expr_scan.l:116: `ssl_expr_yylval' 
undeclared (first use in this function)

it appears in.)

undeclared (first use in this function)

(first use in this function)

undeclared (first use in this function)

undeclared (first use in this function)

Stop.
*** Error exit code 1

Stop.

I'll attach srclib/apr/config.log
Thanks in advance.
creator: luca.fasolo@ecommerce.it

text:
This is fixed in CVS.  As a workaround, try this:
   get a fresh copy of httpd-2.0
   cd httpd-2.0.XX/modules/ssl
   touch ssl_expr_parse.[ch]
   touch ssl_expr_scan.c
creator: jwoolley@apache.org
